Name: Hexdoku
About the game: Another puzzle game with hexagon grid, but difficult! Player must fill the grid with different shapes. Each line and area must not contain same shape, just like classic Sudoku game! Feature 30 unique levels on main branch. Each level is crafted carefully and only have one possible answer. 10 unique levels for each side branch. You have to think differently on every side branch. 4 different beautiful skins for you to choose from. Design your own puzzle and share with people on workshop!
